relatedBlades.title: Security, Performance, and Reliability - all in one package

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Connect, secure, and accelerate your corporate networks

plansList.description: Protect your data centers and network infrastructure against DDoS attacks

buttonModal.modalName: Cloudflare Magic Transit - Product Page Form Modal

marketoForm.bladeName: Magic Transit - Product Page Marketo Form (1341)

buttonModal.title: Cloudflare Magic Transit

features.title: Over %{NetworkCapacityV2} of network capacity
Mitigate most attacks in under 3 seconds
Integrate via BGP routing and GRE encapsulation
Native integration with L7 services (CDN, WAF, Bot Management, etc.)
Support for all IP services (TCP, UDP, IPSec, VoIP, custom protocols)

plansList.description: Replace MPLS between branch offices and data centers

buttonModal.modalName: Magic WAN Product Page Modal Form

marketoForm.bladeName: Magic WAN Product Page Marketo Form
marketoForm.marketoFormLeadSourceDetail: [ACQ] Q1'21 WEB - GBL - Magic WAN Product Page

buttonModal.title: Cloudflare Magic Wan

features.title: Global presence in %{DataCenterCount} cities across 100+ countries
Interconnects with > %{NetworkInterconnects} networks, major ISPs, cloud services, and enterprises
Connect using a variety of network on-ramps, including WAN connector, Anycast-enabled IPsec/GRE tunnels, and direct connection
Composable with Zero Trust SSE on-ramps, including device client and app connector
Unified management plane for network connectivity
Integrated DDoS mitigation, network firewall, and Zero Trust functionality
Fast routing powered by Argo Smart Routing

plansList.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN

marketoForm.marketoFormLeadSourceDetail: [ACQ] Q1'21 WEB - GBL - Magic Firewall Product Page

features.title: Static firewall rules for your entire network for any device, location (branch or HQ), or application
Configured rules deploy in < 500ms globally
Allow or block traffic based on: protocol, source or destination IP and port, packet length, bit field match
Managed threat intelligence IP lists
Geo-blocking based on user location by country
Protocol validation rules to inspect traffic validity
Seamless integration with Cloudflare One Zero Trust services

relatedBlades.title: Network Services Add-Ons
relatedBlades.description: Take your network security and performance even further with Cloudflare's add-ons

content.value: Connect your network to Cloudflare at over 1,600 locations with direct connections or through one of our network-as-a-service partners. Improve network performance, reliability and security.

features.title: Massive network scale
features.description: Our global network spans over %{DataCenterCount} cities and %{CountryCount} countries. Operating within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} milliseconds of about %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population globally.

features.title: Ease of use & guided setup
features.description: No code changes; the Cloudflare dashboard enables quick configuration. Enterprise guided onboarding, training & continued 24/7/365 support.

icon.description: icon easy on and off blue

features.title: Integrated security & performance
features.description: Deeply integrated products that form a unified control plane. Unified layered security across all endpoints & users.

features.title: 24/7 email & phone support
features.description: Award winning, global, 24/7/365 email & emergency phone support (Enterprise plans). Plus on-demand resources, guides & best practice implementation.

features.title: 100% uptime reliability
features.description: Network prioritization exclusive to Cloudflare Enterprise plans. Dependable service level agreements (SLA) with 100% uptime & reliable service you can trust.

features.title: Developer friendly
features.description: Reduce the cost & complexity of legacy network hardware. Augment existing applications or create  new ones without configuring or maintaining infrastructure.

icon.description: icon http2 for web dev blue

relatedBlades.title: Your customers are global. Why isn't your network?

quotearticle.quote: "Thomson Reuters operates on-premise and cloud networks around the world. I'm excited about Cloudflare Magic Transit — the potential to unify our IP transit, DDoS mitigation, and traffic steering solutions into something we can manage with a single pane of glass will be game-changing. Cloudflare continues to impress me with its network's scale, in terms of geography, capacity, and product breadth."

statsFeatures.title: %{NetworkInterconnects}

statsFeatures.description: Average __threats blocked per day__, including some of the largest DDoS attacks ever recorded
